      • getShape

        public java.lang.String getShape()

      • insert

        public boolean insert(Flower f)
        Insert a flower into this pot. If the pot is full, return false.
        Parameters:
        f - The flower to be inserted
        Returns:
        Whether the flower was successfully inserted

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Flower f)
        Search this pot for a flower that matches the given parameter exactly (case insensitive) in terms of colour, species, age (within the nearest whole number) and height (within 0.001).
        If the given flower is null, return whether this pot has empty space.
        Parameters:
        f - The flower to check.
        Returns:
        whether the flower was found in this pot.

      • containsType

        public boolean containsType(java.lang.String f)
        Search this pot for a flower that matches the given species (case insensitive).
        Parameters:
        f - Species of the flower
        Returns:
        whether the flower was found in this pot.

        Parameters:
        f - Colour of the flower
        Returns:
        whether the flower was found in this pot.

        Returns:

        Returns:
        How many flowers are currently in this pot.

        Search this pot for a flower that matches the given species (case insensitive).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Number of flowers that match.

      • view

        public java.lang.String view()
        View the arrangement of the flower pot in terms of its colours.
        Returns:
        A string denoting how many of each colour type there are in this pot. Ordered in alphabetical order by colour.
        For example:
        5x blue
        1x green
        3x red
        1x violet
        2x yellow

      • water

        public void water()
        All the flowers inside this pot grow.

      • rearrange

        public int rearrange()
        Remove all dead flowers from this pot.
        Returns:
        How many dead flowers were removed.

        Calculate the average height of all the live flowers in this pot.

      • filterType

        public Pot filterType(java.lang.String t)
        Return a new pot with only the flowers that match the given species criterion (case insensitive).
        Parameters:
        t - species criterion
        Returns:
        New pot with the flowers. Its shape and size are the same as the original.

      • filterColour

        public Pot filterColour(java.lang.String t)
        Return a new pot with only the flowers that match the given colour criterion (case insensitive).
        Parameters:
        t - colour criterion
        Returns:
        New pot with the flowers. Its shape and size are the same as the original.

      • replace

        public int replace(Flower f1,
                   Flower f2)
        Replace all the flowers matching f1 with f2. Based on having the same colour, species, age (within the nearest whole number) and height (within 0.001).
        If f1 is null, fill all empty spaces in the pot with f2.
        If f2 is null, remove any instances of f1 from the pot.
        Parameters:
        f1 - Flower to be replaced
        f2 - Flower to insert
        Returns:
        How many flowers were replaced

      • replaceType

        public int replaceType(java.lang.String type,
                       Flower f)
        Replace all the flowers matching the given species criterion with f.
        If f is null, remove the matching flowers from the pot.
        Parameters:
        type - Species criterion
        f - Flower to insert
        Returns:
        How many flowers were replaced

      • replaceColour

        public int replaceColour(java.lang.String colour,
                         Flower f)
        Replace all the flowers matching the given colour criterion with f.
        If f is null, remove the matching flowers from the pot.
        Parameters:
        colour - Colour criterion
        f - Flower to insert
        Returns:
        How many flowers were replaced

      • combine

        public static Pot combine(Pot p1,
                          Pot p2)
        Combine the flowers from each pot into one containing only unique colours. Flowers from the first pot (p1) are prioritised over those in p2. The resulting pot should have no spare capacity, and it's shape the same as the first pot.
        If either p1 or p2 are null, return the one which isn't null. If they both are, return null.
        Parameters:
        p1 - First pot to use in the combination
        p2 - Second pot to use in the combination
        Returns:
        The combined pot. It's shape is that of p1.
